title: ahmia39
author: ahmia39
content: Bjorka, the Hacker Who Makes the Government of Indonesia TerrifiedWho exactly is the Bjorka hacker who is currently rummaging through Indonesian government data?The virtual universe is again stirred up by the appearance of a hacker known as Bjorka.This news has shocked Indonesia, where it is suspected that the hacker Bjorka has leaked a lot of government personal data.So what if the hacker moves to the crypto world?are you sure that he will not destroy the cryptocurency market?

comments.author: bitcampaign
comments.body: it's a strange question what does the altcoin thread have to do with hackers breaking into government data in Indonesia, the crypto world is not only hackers but there are many scammers and other crimes so it's only natural that people play crypto to keep it safe. secure wallet, so far there have never been any more cases of hacked crypto exchange sites, so always be careful with that

comments.author: jovan85
comments.body: Maybe it's just government speculation. It's easier to blame a hacker when something goes wrong than to accept responsibility.But I actually thought you missed the thread.

comments.author: Wiwo
comments.body: Government agencies have been hacked on several occasions in the past and that will not stop any time soon as long as crime and cyber security is concerned there will be vulnerability at some point. But if you talking about cryptocurrency then that is a different ball game entirely as I will not panic for a passive hacker if am holding Bitcoin because he can't hack the Bitcoin network to steal data as that can only be done using the source code.

comments.author: wxa7115
comments.body: Quote from: ahmia39 on September 12, 2022, 05:56:19 PMBjorka, the Hacker Who Makes the Government of Indonesia TerrifiedWho exactly is the Bjorka hacker who is currently rummaging through Indonesian government data?The virtual universe is again stirred up by the appearance of a hacker known as Bjorka.This news has shocked Indonesia, where it is suspected that the hacker Bjorka has leaked a lot of government personal data.So what if the hacker moves to the crypto world?are you sure that he will not destroy the cryptocurency market?And what makes you think that we do not have a lot of hackers already in this market? I do not know anything about the hacker you are talking about but the presence of hackers in this market is nothing new, and over the years we have seen several exchanges, casinos, wallets and coins being hacked and despite all of that the market still remains strong.So while we need to always worry about securing our coins properly so we do not lose them to hackers or to scammers, it doesn't seem to make any sense to worry too much about any hacker in particular.

comments.author: Bananington
comments.body: Quote from: ahmia39 on September 12, 2022, 05:56:19 PMBjorka, the Hacker Who Makes the Government of Indonesia TerrifiedInclude links to aid reading, I had to go search for "Bjorka" to see the news about the identity so I could be on the same page with you, some people will not do that. Quote from: ahmia39 on September 12, 2022, 05:56:19 PMSo what if the hacker moves to the crypto world?So far Bjorka has mainly attacked government data, cryptocurrency is not related to government data, so it is highly unlikely that Bjorka will shift attention to the crypto space shortly. The government of Indonesia are already taking measures to ensure that they clamp down on this hacker and have put this hacker at the center of their focus, They may record success soon before maybe Bjorka decides to switch attention to cryptocurrency.

comments.author: Novita
comments.body: Quote from: ahmia39 on September 12, 2022, 05:56:19 PMBjorka, the Hacker Who Makes the Government of Indonesia TerrifiedWho exactly is the Bjorka hacker who is currently rummaging through Indonesian government data?The virtual universe is again stirred up by the appearance of a hacker known as Bjorka.This news has shocked Indonesia, where it is suspected that the hacker Bjorka has leaked a lot of government personal data.So what if the hacker moves to the crypto world?are you sure that he will not destroy the cryptocurency market?Logically, I think, even though a Bjorka hacker, we can say, ransacked Indonesian government data, but I don't believe Bjorka can destroy the cryptocurrency market, because as far as I know, we have never heard of a case of a large crypto site being hacked by Bjorka hackers. . If there is a scammer, this is where we must be able to see the movement and accuracy before we invest in the cryptocurrency market,

comments.author: piebeyb
comments.body: I am also from Indonesia and I heard this is also very unfortunate if something like that happens by committing data theft including breaking the law, I also do not support any crime either in the crypto world or otherwise, we also know that there are many cases of hacking from several exchanges that happened before and it destroyed the crypto community's trust in the Cex exchange and not a few were attacked so many crypto exchanges were closed due to hacker attacks let alone other hacker attacks to take someone's crypto from their computer through a malware virus, so be careful storing any crypto on your computer
